name: Monster Mind
description: Monster Mind is an adult, puzzle-themed Pokémon Fan game first released in April 18, 2018 by a porn artist called ArgonVile. The premise is that an Abra named...well, Abra, has invited the player through a flash game on the internet to test the puzzles they've created for the reward of being able to, ahem, "interact" with them and their friends with a robotic glove.
